mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.product_type_id AS natrualkey, a.product_type_name AS name, b.material_type_id AS materialTypeId, b.material_type_name AS materialTypeName, a.del_flag AS delFlag, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.remark AS remark
mapper.select:
select
FROM t_wl_product_type a,t_wl_material_type b WHERE a.material_type_id = b.material_type_id and a.del_flag=0 AND product_type_id =#{natrualkey} limit 1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_wl_product_type where del_flag=0

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_wl_product_type a,t_wl_material_type b WHERE a.material_type_id = b.material_type_id and a.del_flag=0
and ( a.product_type_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or b.material_type_name like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') or a.remark like concat('%',#{searchValue},'%') )
select case when product_type_id is NULL then 0 else product_type_id end from t_wl_product_type ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1

select product_type_id AS natrualkey, product_type_name AS name from t_wl_product_type where del_flag=0
and upper(product_type_name) like concat('%',#{name},'%')
